blog-basic.title: Homoiconic programming: quasi-quoting versus contextual evaluation.
blog-basic.subtitle: Or: I think Prolog is cool

content.p: If you've stumbed on this without knowing what "homoiconic" means, it doesn't mean a programming language for gay rock stars. Gay rock stars are allowed to use homoiconic programming languages, but I've found no evidence Freddie Mercury used Scheme Lisp in any large projects.
"Homoiconic" here means "data and code look the same". This is
